GSP30pratyabu:637: sat avibhāgavedanātmakabindurūpatayā sphuritaṃ anuttara eva viśrāmyati /
GSP30pratyabu:638: iti śabdarāśisvarūpa eva ayaṃ akṛtako vimarśaḥ /
GSP30pratyabu:642: svātantryam atha kartṛtvaṃ mukhyam īśvaratāpi ca [34] / iti /
GSP30pratyabu:643: eṣaiva ca ahantā sarvamantrāṇāṃ udayaviśrāntisthānatvāt etadbalenaiva c= a
GSP30pratyabu:655: prathate adhyavasīyate smaryate saṃkalpyate vā tatra sarvatraiva bhagavatī
GSP30pratyabu:658: asphuraṇāt ” iti uktatvāt kevalaṃ tathā sphuranty api sā tanmāyāśaktyā
GSP30pratyabu:661: vastutas tu ekaiva asau citiśaktiḥ / yathoktam
GSP30pratyabu:667: evam eṣā sarvadaśāsu ekaiva citiśaktiḥ vijṛmbhamāṇā yadi
GSP30pratyabu:674: yadā tv ekatra saṃrūḍhas tadā tasya layodbhavau /
GSP30pratyabu:675: niyacchan bhoktṛtām eti tataś cakreśvaro bhavet [39] // iti /
GSP30pratyabu:676: atra ekatra iti “ekatrāropayet sarvaṃ” [40] iti citsāmānyaspandabhūḥ
GSP30pratyabu:680: puryaṣṭakam eva parāmraṣṭavyam na tu yathā vivaraṇakṛtaḥ ekatra
GSP30pratyabu:681: sūkṣme sthūle śarīre vā iti vyākṛtavantaḥ /
GSP30pratyabu:687: śivaṃ śivaprāptihetutvāt śivāt prasṛtatvāt śivasvarūpābhinnatvāc ca
GSP30pratyabu:690: pūrṇānandaghanām imāṃ na cinute māheśvarīṃ svāṃ citim /
GSP30pratyabu:692: yaḥ paśyed upadeśatas tu kathitaḥ sākṣāt sa ekaḥ śivaḥ //
